titleStmt.title: A testimony against the Quakers False-doctrine, and the image they have set up Being a defence of the book called Antichrist transformed. In answer to a little book, published by Giles Barnadiston. And for better information, the image is hereto annexed verbatim, with the subscribers thereof. Published by Geoffery Bullock.
titleStmt.author: Bullock, Jeffery, of Sudbury.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and to be sold by Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
